name: Bullet NebulaE
description:
Easy-medium difficulty bullethell game that features 6 stages and 6 bosses (1 per stage!)

KB controls:

-Arrow keys to rotate

-WASD to move

-Spacebar to toggle shooting on/off

-Shift for focus movement

-Ctrl/E for shield activation

KB + Mouse controls:

-Same as KB controls but rotating is done with mouse

-RMB for focus movement

-LMB for shield activation

Controller controls:

-Left stick movement

-Right stick aiming

-Right shoulderbutton focus movement

-Right bumper toggle shooting on/off

-Left shoulder button activate shield

Game contains no music so you can play your own, you can also add .ogg files in the appropriate folders under %localappdata%\Bullet_NebulaE\Music so the music will be played at the appriopriate time in the game.

If the game crashes or if a replay desyncs, feel free to inform me about it so I can work on fixing the issue.

Misc:

-B to take a screenshot (saved under %localappdata%\Bullet_NebulaE\screenshots)

-Ctrl to speed up a replay

-Shift to slow down a replay
